turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Grey's Anatomy (season 12).
turn.1: What happened in season 12 of Grey's Anatomy?
turn.2: Callie brings Penny to a dinner party hosted by Meredith, Amelia and Maggie.
turn.3: What happened at the dinner party?
turn.4: Once arriving Meredith immediately recognizes Penny as one of the doctors that worked on her husband, Derek Shepherd at the time of his death.
turn.6: This news brings much dismay to Callie, however she still continues into a relationship with Penny causing tension between herself, Meredith and Amelia Shepherd.
turn.7: What happens with Penny after that?
turn.8: Meredith begins working with Penny and finds it very difficult, although after seeking the advice of Richard Webber (James Pickens Jr.), Meredith forms a working relationship with Penny and the two form a student and mentor bond.
turn.10: Nathan Riggs (Martin Henderson), a friend of April's from Jordan, is hired by Bailey.
turn.12: He is revealed to have a dark history with Owen Hunt (Kevin McKidd), resulting in much friction between Hunt and Riggs, to the point where there is even a physical conflict.
